info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:57PM CDT until May 31 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL WARD...SOUTHWESTERN WINKLER AND SOUTHEASTERN LOVING COUNTIES... At 657 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Barstow, or 14 miles northeast of Pecos, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Barstow. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 52 and 60. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
